Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scaraboid
Description: This scaraboid is decorated in the likeness of a shell through a series of radiating lines around its edges.  It was pierced, thus allowing for the object to be suspended. The reverse is adorned with an Egyptian motif: a Hathor head framed by two erect cobras.
